name: The Absorber (itch) (Ramose Tsimbina)
description:
"Rise and shine my child.

You have been chosen.

Now, go and seek the power that you need to rebirth.

We will guide you." - The Twins

You will play as an Absorber who really wants to rebirth and seek power to achieve his goal.

In the game you need to find the Ancient key to open the Demon's gate and fight the Ancient Demon.

But, in your way, you will fight many foes and solve puzzles.

This game was made for the game jam called "IGMC : Rebirth"

Hope you gonna like the game :)

Credits:
